body.name: Cinnado Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor-2K Cameras for Home Security Outside Solar/Battery Powered 2.4G WiFi, 360° Color Night Vision, 2 Way Audio, PIR Human Detection, Works with Alexa/Google Home
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 10 mins
features: Solar Uninterupted Power and True Wireless: Cinnado security cameras wireless outdoor solar powered harness the sun's energy with solar panel (solar panel included). No need to plug in, the solar panel will keeps the camera powered. Even in bad weather or low-light situations, the backup battery will ensure uninterupted footage monitoring. Please note that this outdoor camera only support 2.4G wifi. 5G wifi is not supported. No motion tracking. No 24/7 continuous recording.

Crystal 2K Resolution and Color Night Vision: The solar security cameras wireless outdoor shoot every detail with a remarkable 2K resolution, The max resolution is 2304x1296p. In cases of limited network connectivity, it can switch to a reliable 768x432p SD resolution. This camera offers multiple night vision mode: Full color night, Intelligent light and Auto infrared mode. This enhances visibility and allows you to identify potential threats, making your home security robust and effective.

AI Human Detection and Two-Way Audio: The security cameras wireless outdoor are equipped with advanced human detection technology. When the camera detects human, you can engage in real-time 2-way audio communication with the person on the camera's end using your mobile device. This feature allows you to not only monitor but also interact with visitors or potential intruders. PIR detection sensitivity can be adjusted in three levels, range from 16-29 feet.

All-Weather Protection and PTZ: The cameras for home security outside with an IP65 waterproof rating,it is designed to withstand rain, snow, and harsh weather conditions. Moreover, our camera has PTZ (Pan-Tilt-Zoom) function, allowing you to remotely pan, tilt, and zoom the camera lens to get a comprehensive view of your surroundings. This level of control provides you with the flexibility to monitor your home from any angle, at any time, making it a powerful tool for safeguarding your home.

SD Card/Cloud Storage and Works with Alexa&Google Home: The security camera outdoor supports both SD card and cloud storage.( SD card is not included. Cloud storage is not forced.) The micro SD card storage allows you to access the recordings on PC without internet connection. Opt for cloud storage to securely store your footage online, which can last for as long as 30 days. Additionally, it integrates with Alexa and Google Home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Please read this before buying: This Cinnado outdoor cameras doesn't support motion tracking and 24/7 continous recording. Doesn't support 5G wifi.
Previous page Next page 1 360° PTZ Control 2 2K Resolution 3 Color Night Vision 4 Real Time 2-Way Audio

Previous page PIR and AI detection PIR and AI person detection, minimizing false alarms and keeping you informed of relevant events. IP65 Waterproof Operate in temperatures ranging from -10°C to 50°C, work reliably in diverse weather conditions. Next page 1 PIR and AI Detection 2 IP65 Waterproof 3 Works with Alexa

SD Card Storage and Cloud Storage These security cameras wireless outdoor support both SD card and cloud storage for your video footage. New users enjoy 30-days cloud storage trial. You don't have to subscribe to the cloud service to use the camera. The wifi camera accommodates up to 128GB of storage in both FAT32 and exFAT formats. Share Your Camera with the Loved Ones Our security camera lets you share access with family and friends, no matter where they are on the globe. Stay connected and grant instant access to loved ones, even if they're on the other side of the Earth.Share the security with ease!

Multiple Alarms: scare away the unwanted guests Instant APP Notification Light Warning Siren Warning Instant App Notification You will receive instant app notification when there is a motion detected. Light Warning The wifi camera will activate bright light warnings when it detects motion. Siren Warning The outdor camera wireless will go off the siren when triggered by motion. Motion Alert Please turn on the motion alert function first to get notification. Diverse Night Vision Modes If you don't need the light turns on often, you can manually turn the light on. Turn Siren Off You can turn off trigger by motion and manually go off the siren.

Does this security camera support 5G wifi connection? The CInnado solar camera security outdoor will only support 2.4G wifi connection, 5G wifi is not supported. Can the outdoor camera track motion? The Cinnado home security camera DOES NOT support automatic motion tracking. However, you can rotate the camera on the app to view different angles Does the cameras for home security outside support 24/7 continuous recording? The Cinnado solar outdoor camera DOES NOT support continuous recording. The battery-type cameras do not support continuous recording to save the battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let me tell you, this camera is a total game-changer for keeping an eye on things!First off, the night vision is like something out of a spy movie. It's got this infrared magic that captures clear shots even in the pitch dark. No more worrying about what's happening outside when the lights go out. And during the day? Oh man, the colors pop, and you can practically zoom in to read license plates from a couple driveways away. It's like having a high-tech detective right on your property. But wait, there's more! The camera can move around like it's on a dance floor. The pan-tilt feature lets you control it from your phone using the easy to use Wansview App, so you can see everything happening in a wide area. Super handy, especially if you've got a big place to watch over. I took several pictures with the same camera after panning/tilting it to show that I can easily cover both sides of my street.Now, the real kicker – solar power. Yep, this bad boy comes with its own mini solar panel. No more stressing about changing batteries or dealing with complicated wiring. It soaks up the sun during the day, keeping your battery strong even in places without a power outlet. The best part... I can disconnect the solar panel, and charge other stationary cameras that accept a USB-C port (these cameras also use the same Wansview App).Setting it up was a breeze, too. The app is user-friendly, and you can check what's going on from anywhere. Total win! If you're into smart and hassle-free security, this cam's your new best friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect outdoor security camera!
reviews.reviewText: I have a couple areas on my property I want to monitor, but with no electrical outlets nearby, I needed something solar. After lots of research, I decided on this one and I’m SO glad I did! It’s absolutely perfect for my needs. It has a huge range of view with the pan and tilt, and I can monitor a very large chunk of my property. It works great even at night, and because it’s solar powered, there are no long extension cords criss-crossing my yard to where I needed it.Installation was a breeze. I charged it up before installing it since it’s fall in Wisconsin and sun is sporadic. With a full charge, I followed the instructions and it was installed and I was watching video on my phone in under 10 minutes. It’s staying charged very well from the sun, but if winter in Wisconsin brings too many days of dark, I love that I can quick charge it up again with a cord. Solar can be tricky in winter, but this seems to be charging great even with limited sunlight!The picture is clear, and I love the two way audio. I had a raccoon try to get into my duck pen the second night I had it. The motion alert, which I had set on, alerted me. I flipped open the app on my phone and saw the little bugger trying to get in. I hit the microphone and started yelling, and he took off screaming across the yard! I don’t think he’ll be back again! LOLIf you’re looking for a great all-around security camera for areas with limited power, this is the one. Five big stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and use, excellent value, plenty of internal battery capacity
reviews.reviewText: This Cinnado camera is part of the Wansview family of cameras. They use the Wansview app to view, operate, and configure.Setup is very easy, just follow the prompts on the Wansview app EXACTLY and the camera will be up and running in under a minute. One thing to note is that battery-powered cameras such as these do not have RTSP video streaming so cannot be used with Zoneminder, but they can be used with Google Home or Alexa (I did not try either one).I bought the 2-pack and put one camera outside aiming at the rear entry door of my house, powered by the solar panel and the other camera is inside aiming at the same door and not connected to any power source (using internal battery only).The outdoor cam has a 32G micro SD card installed and is set to record motion events while the indoor cam is connected to wifi and is for viewing only. I've used just over half gig of storage in 24 days in the outdoor camera. When the card eventually fills the camera is set to overwrite older files.Battery life is fantastic. As a test, the indoor camera was charged with a standard USB-C phone charger for 24 hours and on 12/7/23 put into service. As of 12/26/23 the camera is still working and showing 100% battery. Even if the battery gauge is inaccurate, running 19 days so far on only it's internal battery is amazing. The outdoor camera has never shown less than 97% battery as the solar panel keeps it charged even after a few days of cloudy and rainy conditions. Also, the outdoor camera has been set to turn on it's white lights for 15 seconds when motion is detected so it should use more power than the indoor one. You don't have to worry about these cameras running out of power.Picture quality is excellent. The 2K resolution combined with a good lens make these probably the best security cameras I own for video quality. I'm not sure of the lens focal length, but it does not fisheye like a 1.7mm and the view is wider than a 3mm. It's the proper angle-of-view for typical suburban home use (in my opinion). At night the infrareds light up the area just fine and the option to turn on the white lights when motion is detected (and the video then records in color) is an added benefit.I am so impressed by these cameras that, even though I cannot link them to my Zoneminder central monitoring system via RTSP I will use internal micro SD storage and the Wansview app to have a second security 'system' to complement my existing Zoneminder setup. Like the other Wansview cameras I have, these B6's so far have been operating perfectly with no glitches or lockups. I will update this review once I find out exactly how long the camera lasts on it's internal battery. Impressive!
